entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:17 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.0°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late this evening. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Otherwise clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
